name: UIAppearance
desc: A collection of methods that gives you access to the appearance proxy for a class.

items.name: static func appearance() -> Self
items.desc: Returns the appearance proxy for the receiver.

items.name: static func appearance(for: UITraitCollection) -> Self
items.desc: Returns the appearance proxy for the receiver that has the passed trait collection.

items.name: static func appearance(whenContainedInInstancesOf: [UIAppearanceContainer.Type]) -> Self
items.desc: Returns the appearance proxy for the object when it is contained in the hierarchy the specified classes describe.

items.name: static func appearance(for: UITraitCollection, whenContainedInInstancesOf: [UIAppearanceContainer.Type]) -> Self
items.desc: Returns the appearance proxy for the object when it is contained in the hierarchy the specified classes describe and has the specified trait collection.
